languages.text: "Скажи, преподобный, записываешь ли ты свои покаяния в святилище исповедей, как другие офицеры?"

traits.locale_text: "Скажи, преподобный, открываешь ли ты душу исповедальной машине, как другие офицеры?"

languages.text: "Tell me, Adalbert, do you visit the shrine confessional to repent as the other officers do?"
languages.original_text: "Скажи, преподобный, записываешь ли ты свои покаяния в святилище исповедей, как другие офицеры?"

traits.locale_text: "Tell me, Adalbert, do you visit the shrine confessional to repent as the other officers do?"
"Tell me, Adalbert, do you visit the shrine confessional to repent as the other officers do?"
"Tell me, Reverend, do you open your soul to the confession machine as the other officers do?"
"Tell me, Reverend, do you open your soul to the confession machine as the other officers do?"
"Tell me, Adalbert, do you visit the shrine confessional to repent as the other officers do?"
"Tell me, Adalbert, do you visit the shrine confessional to repent as the other officers do?"

languages.text: «Dígame, Adalbert, ¿usted también viene a confesarse al altar como los otros oficiales?».
languages.original_text: "Tell me, Adalbert, do you visit the shrine confessional to repent as the other officers do?"

traits.locale_text: «Dígame, reverendo, ¿usted también abre su alma a la máquina confesora, como los otros oficiales?».

languages.text: 「教えてください、アダルバート。あなたは他の士官と同じように懺悔室を訪れて懺悔するのですか？」
languages.original_text: "Tell me, Adalbert, do you visit the shrine confessional to repent as the other officers do?"

traits.locale_text: 「教えてください、牧師さん。あなたは他の士官と同じように、告白の機械に心を開いているのですか？」

languages.text: “和我说说吧，阿达伯特，你会像其他军官那样，去祭坛进行告解吗？”
languages.original_text: "Tell me, Adalbert, do you visit the shrine confessional to repent as the other officers do?"

traits.locale_text: “和我说说吧，牧师，你会像其他军官那样，对忏悔机敞开心扉吗？”

languages.text: "Sagt mir, Adalbert, besucht auch ihr den Bekenntnisschrei, um Buße zu tun, wie die anderen Offiziere?"
languages.original_text: "Tell me, Adalbert, do you visit the shrine confessional to repent as the other officers do?"

traits.locale_text: "Sagt, Reverend, öffnet Ihr Eure Seele der Beichtmaschine, wie es die anderen Offiziere tun?"

languages.text: « Dites-moi, Adalbert, vous rendez-vous auprès du confessionnal pour vous repentir, à l'image des autres officiers ? »
languages.original_text: "Tell me, Adalbert, do you visit the shrine confessional to repent as the other officers do?"

traits.locale_text: « Dites-moi, révérend, vous arrive-t-il d'ouvrir votre âme à la machine à confessions, comme le font les autres officiers ? »

languages.text: "Söylesene Adalbert, sen de diğer subaylar gibi günah çıkarma birimi mabedini ziyaret edip günah çıkarıyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "Tell me, Adalbert, do you visit the shrine confessional to repent as the other officers do?"
